name: My gun is a Demon
description:
2D Shoot-out Metafab Game Jam submission.

Controls: WASD or Arrows to move, Mouse Right Button to aim, Mouse Left Button to shoot. 1 2 3 4 5 to plot items from hotbar. 

To play, insert an User and Password, clic in Register, wait 3 sec (to metafab system register your account) clic in Login. 

Items:
Speed up buff: Increase bullet speed when collide with that object.
Mine: Explode and deal damage to enemies nearby when a enemy or bullet collide with that item.
Spikes: Deal damage to all enemies on top of spikes. (Duration: 4 waves)
Granade: Explode and deal damage to enemies nerby after 3 seconds
Tentacle: Deal damage to all enemies nearby. (Duration: 3 waves)

Art by: Roguepug

Code by: Doufa

Sound by: Dinonosso

Metafab used to: Player Account management and Data Save.
